snippet: Stewart, a junior at Connecticut, was named the winner of the Associated Press Player of the Year Award on Saturday for the second consecutive year, becoming the fifth player to win it twice.
abstract: Associated Press names Connecticut guard Breanna Stewart player of the year for second consecutive year.
lead_paragraph: Stewart, a junior at Connecticut, was named the winner of the Associated Press Player of the Year Award on Saturday for the second consecutive year, becoming the fifth player to win it twice.
